articles.title: Live updates: Serena Williams' US Open singles tennis match vs. Anett Kontaveit

articles.title: Analysis: The case against Trump is starting to come into focus. Here's what we know
articles.description: The Department of Justice doesn't want you to believe what former President Donald Trump says about the classified documents found at Mar-a-Lago. A new filing reveals piecemeal details, which form a picture of the case the DOJ could potentially bring against …

articles.author: Josh Campbell and Katie Bo Lillis, CNN
articles.title: Dissecting 7 key pieces of the Mar-a-Lago photo
articles.description: Included in the government's latest court filing — in its effort to investigate Donald Trump's handling of classified materials — is a single, tantalizing photograph showing an array of documents found on the property of the former president's Florida resort.
